import closeIcon from '../../images/closeIcon.png' import { useState } from 'react' interface RegistrationFormProps { option: string setOption: React.Dispatch> } function RegistrationForm({ option = "user", setOption }: RegistrationFormProps) { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({}); const [entries, setEntries] = useState([]); function handleChange(event: React.ChangeEvent) { const { name, value } = event.target; setFormData((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); } function handleFileChange(event: React.ChangeEvent) { if (event.target.files && event.target.files[0]) { setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, profileImage: event.target.files[0] })); } } function handleAddAnother() { setEntries(prev => [...prev, formData]); setFormData({}); } function handleFinish() { setEntries(prev => [...prev, formData]); console.log("Final Data:", [...entries, formData]); // Replace with API submission setOption(null); } let formContent; switch (option) { case "user": formContent = (

User Registration

); break; case "children": formContent = (

Children Registration

); break; default: formContent =

Please select an option.

; break; } return (
setOption(null)} />
) } export default RegistrationForm
